153.content: Do you continue with anthro horses, ponies or centaurs?
153.title: Horse story

choices: Both your mother and sister watching tv
154.content:
In nature, a mother deer will instinctively eat their fawns scat to protect them from predators so they can't track their scent.

Of course over millions of years of evolution has caused deers, and all other mammals to evolve into anthro animals, and now you all live in a zootopia like world! (Except not the actual zootopia world)

Unfortunately in society, some natural instincts are still left in the minds of animals. For deer, it's an extremely rare occurrence that a mother will feel the need to eat their fawns shit. Thankfully there's a medication out there to suppress this instinct.

You, your a extremely rare exception for this case, as you are a male deer with this instinct. This instinct kick in for You while You were starting puberty. You found out about it, because one day you had to go to the washroom. And as soon as your mother got out, you ran in. And to your surprise. Your mother completely forgot to flush after taking a huge shit! She must have totally forgot. You were about to flush, when you cought a whiff of her shit, and that set of to trigger in your brain telling you to eat the contents floating in the bowl. You tried your hardest to resist the urge, but the instinct won in the end, and you ate every last pelt in the bowl, still somewhat warm because they just left your mother's but.

Weird thing was, you didn't feel sick or anything afterwards. You didn't even regret eating your mother's shit. You knew it was wrong. But you felt satisfied by doing it.

You never got this urge anywhere else. It was only the smell of your mother's, and sister's shit that made you hungry. The brain must have some way to tell if the smell comes from your family.

You quickly learned how to control your urges. You still get hungry smelling even a weak fart from your mom or sis, but at least you can hide it, and your still in control 2 years later.

Without further back story, last week was your 14th birthday. Only 2 more years till you loose your fawn spots. Today your playing some new video games in your room, and you decide to take a break, to watch some tv in the living room. Who was in there?
154.title: Deer story

1541.content:
You walk into the living room, and you see your mother watching TV. "Morning mom, what are you up to?" You ask out of curiosity.

"Morning? It's 12:30! I think you've been staying up too late playing that new game." She said in a bit of a sarcastic remark.

"Hey your the one who bought it for me." You sit down beside her. "So what show are you watching?" You ask.

"Its a new show called Odd Ball Fetish. Its only on TLC."

"Why dose it not surprise me it's on TLC." You jokingly say. Soon enough the show starts up.

A female horse reporter starts the show. "Today on odd ball fetish, we're going into depth on Eproctophilia. What's that you might ask? Well Eproctophilia is the fancy word for fart fetish." You and your mother look at each other and blush as you continue to watch the show. "Today we are at the 'Low Limits Strip Bar' In down town vixvill! And it looks like a red wolf over there is enjoying himself tonight. Well let's see if he won't mind a sexy mare farting in his face." She walks over and introduces her self to the wolf "yellow there! What's your name? And why are you hear tonight?" "Hello, my name is Anthony, and I'm here celebrating my 18th birthday!" The wolf said excitingly. "Well Anthony, how would you like a $1000 in free dances tonight, provided I get to fart in your face. I can even fart on you for as long as you want, seeing how it's your birthday and all." She said in a seductive tone. "Well... I... mean.. I.. umm.. s... sure?.. I guess you c... could?" The wolf stumbles to say "happy to hear. Let's go somewhere a little more private." The horse lady grabs the wolf and guides him to a private back room. She sits him down on a seat, and presses her rear up to his nose *PPPPPPRRRRRRRRFFFpppppppppppppp* she let's out a long smelly fart. and the wolf starts to caugh.

You and your mother both look at each other, and both decide...
